title: Duster Episode 8 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch

The recent episodes showcased Jim and Nina unfolding the dangerous world of drugs, murder, and cover-ups after exposing Saxton’s world. However, a mysterious enemy threatened to harm them. Further, the duo survived an ambush, and their bond strengthened as their enemies continued […] The post Duster Episode 8 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ritika Singh
excerpt: Curious to find out about the Duster Episode 8 release date and time? Here are all the details on that and more.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Duster Episode 8 release date and time are right around the corner. The recent episodes showcased Jim and Nina unfolding the dangerous world of drugs, murder, and cover-ups after exposing Saxton’s world. However, a mysterious enemy threatened to harm them. Further, the duo survived an ambush, and their bond strengthened as their enemies continued to increase. Here’s all you need to know about the release date and time of Duster’s last episode, including how you can stream it online. When is the Duster Episode 8 release date & time? The episode’s release date is July 3, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJuly 3, 20259 PMPacific TimeJuly 3, 20256 PM Where to watch Duster Episode 8 You can watch Duster Episode 8 via HBO Max. HBO Max is a premium streaming service from Warner Bros. Discovery that offers a wide range of content, including HBO originals, Warner Bros. movies, DC films, Max Originals, and movies/shows from other networks. Fans can watch all the episodes of Duster as and when they are released on HBO Max after paying for a subscription. This is because the platform does not offer any free trials. What is Duster about? The action drama uncovers the journey of the FBI’s first-ever Black female agent, Nina, who resolves to expose a drug cartel. In this mission, she is joined by a skilled getaway driver, Jim, leading to an unusual tale of thrills and emotions. The official synopsis for Duster is as follows: “In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
html:
The Duster Episode 8 release date and time are right around the corner. The recent episodes showcased Jim and Nina unfolding the dangerous world of drugs, murder, and cover-ups after exposing Saxton’s world. However, a mysterious enemy threatened to harm them. Further, the duo survived an ambush, and their bond strengthened as their enemies continued to increase.

Here’s all you need to know about the release date and time of Duster’s last episode, including how you can stream it online.

When is the Duster Episode 8 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is July 3, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Where to watch Duster Episode 8

You can watch Duster Episode 8 via HBO Max.

HBO Max is a premium streaming service from Warner Bros. Discovery that offers a wide range of content, including HBO originals, Warner Bros. movies, DC films, Max Originals, and movies/shows from other networks. Fans can watch all the episodes of Duster as and when they are released on HBO Max after paying for a subscription. This is because the platform does not offer any free trials.

What is Duster about?

The action drama uncovers the journey of the FBI’s first-ever Black female agent, Nina, who resolves to expose a drug cartel. In this mission, she is joined by a skilled getaway driver, Jim, leading to an unusual tale of thrills and emotions.

The official synopsis for Duster is as follows:

“In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
